this is the episode at the time the test was requested
this is the date that the episode case that was open/active when this test was requested was opened
This represents whether the test was entered as part of the "direct test entry" workflow.
If the value is true, the person was created by the Nikshay DSTB migration. For all other values, the person was not created by the Nikshay DSTB migration.
If value is pmdt_excel, the person was created by the PMDT excel migration. For all other values, the person was not created by the PMDT excel migration.

Column Name: Referred to - Facility Name - C&DST Lab

Notes: This was not populated for migrated cases
This is the UUID of the facility in CommCare. This was not a required question. Therefore if the Testing Facility name was entered as freetext, no ID will be available here
This value could be selected from a list or entered via free text

Column Name: Date of Medical Officer's confirmation/ Signature

this summary changes as relevant to the test type

Column Name: Test requested form submitted by - ID
Notes: This is the UUID of the User in CommCare.

Column Name: Test Requested Form submitted By - User Name

Notes: If the test was created through a migration, this would reflect the date of the migration.

we do not specifically capture the user_id of the user who submitted the results, however we can estimate based on the fact that no changes should have been made to the test post-result entry. Caveat: a system event could update the case post-result entry (e.g. some kind of migration). If that's the case then "Overwritten due to bulk changes" will be the value here.
Calculation: if(self.result_recorded = 'yes', username of the user who set self.result_recorded = 'yes', '')

Notes: we do not specifically capture the user_id of the user who submitted the results, however we can estimate based on the fact that no changes should have been made to the test post-result entry. Caveat: a system event could update the case post-result entry (e.g. some kind of migration). If that's the case then "Overwritten due to bulk changes" will be the value here.
Calculation: if(self.result_recorded = 'yes', user id of the user who set self.result_recorded = 'yes', '')

Notes: we do not specifically capture the date of submission for the form that set the results, however we can estimate based on the fact that no changes should have been made to the test post-result entry. Caveat: a system event could update the case post-result entry (e.g. some kind of migration). If that's the case then "Overwritten due to bulk changes" will be the value here.
Calculation: if(self.result_recorded = 'yes', submission time of the form that set self.result_recorded = 'yes', '')
